title: Betting on League of Legends
body:
Does Riot endorse this?

http:// **[LINK REMOVED - Wuks]** /online-lol-betting-25-75?CMP=SOM|SBT|FACEBOOK|OFFERDB|25&nan_pid=1848918488&dclid=CJvwiPvBussCFYWEvAodp_EAPg

replies.body:
Riot does not endorse or support websites such as these, and as a general rule, Riot doesn't endorse or approve of too many websites. As such, it's best that you use external websites at your own risk. Laws governing gambling vary from location to location, so make sure that you gamble safely and legally if you choose to gamble. 

Cheers!
